item.title: Hugo journal entries with Emacs
item.description: 13:42 Wednesday 08 November 2017 JST To kick off this little journal entry, I type C-c j and then enter the title, as many tags as I like, then hit enter a few times to confirm the date, and get the following YAML meta data for the entry: --- title: "Hugo journal entries with Emacs" tags: [ "emacs", "journal", "quotes", "hugo" ] author: Rob Nugen date: 2017-11-08T13:42:06+09:00 --- ## 13:42 Wednesday 08 November 2017 JST Today I modified my code to add quotes around the title (so my Marble Track 3 entries can have titles including colons: “mt3: started last track”
